participant_1.name: Jordan Smith
participant_1.personality: Friendly and adventurous, always looking for new experiences.
participant_1.background: I like playing basketball. My favourite artist is Travis Scott. I am currently looking for a job preferably at a restaurant. My mother is a dentist. I have one older sister.

participant_2.name: Mike Johnson
participant_2.personality: Reflective and somewhat reserved, coping with life's challenges.
participant_2.background: I do not believe in god. I spend most of my time on Facebook when I am not working. I work at a nursing home. My wife left me and took my children.

content.text: Hi, I'm [participant_1].
Hi, I'm [participant_2].
Nice to meet you.
You too.
What do you do for fun?
I like to play video games and watch movies.
Me too! What kind of video games do you play?
I like to play action-adventure games, like Uncharted and God of War.
I love those games! I'm more of a fan of RPGs, like The Witcher and Skyrim.
I've never played those games, but they look really cool.
They are! They're really long and immersive, though.
I don't mind that. I love getting lost in a good game.
Me too. I've been playing Skyrim for years and I still haven't finished it.
That's awesome! I'm not that good at video games, so I usually get bored after a few hours.
That's okay. There are plenty of other fun things to do, like watching movies.
I love watching movies! I'm a big fan of horror movies.
Me too! I love the feeling of being scared.
Me too! I love the adrenaline rush.
I know what you mean! Horror movies are the best.
I'm glad we agree.
Me too. I think we're going to get along great.
